amendment.description: Amendment sought to narrow the applicability of the bill's additional appeal process from applying to all financial institutions regardless of their size, including global banks and payday lenders, to only small, community banks and credit unions with less than $10 billion in assets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-595 to narrow the applicability of the bill's additional appeal process from applying to all financial institutions regardless of their size, including megabanks and payday lenders, to only small, community banks and credit unions with less than $10 billion in assets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters, Maxine amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 184 - 233 (Roll no. 111).

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Waters, Maxine.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Waters, Maxine.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Waters, Maxine amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 184 - 233 (Roll no. 111).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters, Maxine amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 184 - 233 (Roll no. 111).
